author: USA TODAY, William Cummings, USA TODAY
title: Sen. Kennedy says economic activity must resume even though that means coronavirus will 'spread faster'
description: "When we end the shutdown, the virus is going to spread faster," Kennedy acknowledged. "That's just a fact. And the American people understand that."
content:
The coronavirus is causing major stresses in households. Here's a look at how the country is doing and tips on how to cope with mental health issues.
USA TODAY
